title: Dear Riot Games, DO SOMETHING ABOUT THE BOTS/CHEATS!!!!

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I have been playing ARAM for quite a while now,
and I notice something ridiculous happened recently.
[This is my match history with 2 BOTS in my team and FOUR on the other one!!!!!!!](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/115762319/315770?tab=overview)
and,
[Another one with 2 BOTS in our team, 3v5 and the 2 bots keep feeding.](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/115770123/315770?tab=overview)
Dear Riot Games,
I have been playing the game since it releases.
Things have changed so much within these years,
I notice that there are some players old as me left the game already.
However, many of us are staying because the game is still fun to us and the sense of community bonded us together.
But REALLY RIOT? REALLY? HUMAN BOTS?
 It ruins every single game in ARAM now, 
We cannot leave the game because there will be punishments,
staying in the game is either killing bots for 30 mins with a meaningless win getting 46 IP,
or,
Getting killed in many many 2v5, 3v5, 1v3, etc. situations, spend another 30 mins for a guarantee lost and end up only getting 56 IP.

This is ef'ed up and PLEASE ROIT.
DO SOMETHING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I AM, AND I BELIEVE MANY OF OTHERS HAVE BEEN IN THIS SITUATION ARE,  DISAPPOINTED.

replies.body:
Hey SparklingPenguin,


As this is a discussion pertaining to one of the Player Behavior & Reform systems [3rd Party Applications; Botting] in League of Legends, the best place for this discussion would be the [**Player Behavior & Moderation**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) sub-boards. I, another Arbiter, or a member of the community would love to have a more in-depth conversation with you about this topic there!
